        public static boolean has(MinecartMember<?> member,
                          MinecartGroup group,
                          java.lang.String text,

        Gets if the member or group has the statement specified
        Parameters:
        member - to use, or null to use group
        group - to use, or null to use member
        text - to evaluate
        event - to parse
        Returns:
        True if successful, False if not

      • match

        public abstract boolean match(java.lang.String text)
        Checks if this statement matches the given text The given text is lower cased.
        Parameters:
        text - to use
        Returns:
        if it matches and can handle it

      • matchArray

        public abstract boolean matchArray(java.lang.String text)
        Checks if this statement matches the given text The given text is lower cased. The text is the pre-text of '@'
        Parameters:
        text - to use
        Returns:
        if it matches and can handle an array
